properties.Title: Bilkent University
properties.Desc: Sleepless nights in labs, intense examaniations, extraordinary projects... Beautiful 4 years spent with friendships that I couldn't be more grateful for. You'll always be my home Bilkent!

properties.Title: RWTH Aachen University
properties.Desc: Master's study in Electricall Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering. Work in progress to major in Computer Engineering... I hope to fill here with more content as I advance in my Master's Studies at RWTH Aachen!
